content.en: Power system optimization: Researchers are investigating the effectiveness of various algorithms in improving the stability and performance of power systems. These algorithms, such as wavelet transform, adaptive neuro-fuzzy inference system, and fuzzy wavelet neural networks, are being used to control and dampen oscillations in power systems. The goal is to enhance power system stability and ensure reliable electricity supply, especially in smart cities and multi-machine systems.
content.da: Optimering af elsystemer: Forskere undersøger effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre stabiliteten og ydeevnen af elsystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom wavelet-transform, adaptivt neuro-fuzzy inferenssystem og fuzzy wavelet neurale netværk, bliver brugt til at kontrollere og dæmpe svingninger i elsystemer. Målet er at forbedre stabiliteten af elsystemer og sikre en pålidelig elforsyning, især i smarte byer og multi-maskine systemer.
